name: Forgotten (Mosaique Games)
description:
While exploring an abandoned fort, the ground beneath you crumble and you fall to find yourself trapped in a dungeon!

The more you interact with the people trapped with you, the more their stories unravel. Talk your way out!

Controls: Arrow keys & Space bar

"Forgotten" is a solo effort.

Extra Remix: Some sprites are monochrome version from "Tomb Towers", a game published on Steam
